attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want the premier league to treat fans of premier league football teams with more respect.

They continue to cut down on what fans can and cannot use, with the latest being video footage - Even footage recorded of your own mobile phone.

Other things include, not being able to use images for your football club for personal websites.

If you think that fans of the Premier League should be treated with more repspect the sign up here!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
